nodes.text: The Royal Felacatian Palace was a large multilevel structure on the planet Felacat that acted as home to the planet's royal family. It was defended by the Felacatian Royal Palace Guard.

During the Clone Wars, while the Felacatian Miaria Prrt was Queen, Felacat was invaded by the Confederacy of Independent Systems's droid army, who besieged the palace using B1-Series battle droids and B2 super battle droids supported by Armored Assault Tanks. The queen sent multiple communications to the Galactic Republic, with whom the Felacat were allied, asking for reinforcements against the Separatists but was told no reinforcements were available to be sent. Six weeks, three days and seven hours after the siege began, Togruta Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano arrived on Felacat and landed on the palace's upper level alone with her astromech droid, R7-A7, to provide aid but was mistaken for a Separatist spy by the Felacatian Royal Palace Guard and brought before the queen. Miaria recognized the Jedi as Republic aid but argued with her over the lateness of her arrival before the pair was interrupted by super battle droids breaching the palace's main gate, causing the palace guard to panic and flee. Ahsoka and the queen worked together to fend off the droids with the queen assuming her beast form. This show of courage also motivated the guard, who themselves transformed and together with the Jedi fought off the droids, ending the siege on the palace.

The Felacatian Royal Palace was created by writer Robin Etherington and drawn by Andres Ponce for the short comic The Feral Queen, in which it was the main setting. The comic was published in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK 6.21.
